Thanks cbuhka first of all for the excellent working upload.  nice job.

Second, I thought I would give some thorough instructions as to how to get it working.  

1. After downloading, install all three disks using something like daemon.  Do not worry about the crack at this stage. just install first.

2. After installing what you need to do is go into the crack file in the download and copy it. You will paste this into a map called the conquest map in the game file. The crack replaces an exe (execute) file with the same name, so the game runs through the cracked file instead of the original which wants proper verification.

3. Ok, so after copying you go into the conquest file. You will find this file in the game file which, if you took the default suggestion, was probably C:\Program\Atari\Civilization III Complete

the actual map is   C:\Program\Atari\Civilization III Complete\Conquests

once in this file you just paste in the copied crack. Your computer will ask you if you want to replace the other file with the same name.  Say yes. 

then, after that, you are set. the game works. click on the new exe. file in the conquests map or on the shortcut on the desktop and you are on your way to world domination.

Cheers
